QuestData.Title: The Three
QuestData.Description: When High Crawliac seized control of the harpies she placed 3 powerful and deadly witches in charge of the covens under her command.$b$bThese witches must die. Feel up for the challenge?$b$bHead into the Haglands behind me and find these three evil creatures.$b$bWe will cover you from the air and give your prey no sky to retreat.$b$bLook for us higher up the mountain, should you survive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Ragi the Hexxer, Agara Deathsong, and Ugla the Hag.
QuestData.CompletionText: Many Skyhorn have fallen to the witchcraft of these hags.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done. Now to cut the head off the snake, as it were.
